content: empower people bandana crochet pattern skill level easy size one size fits most bandana finished dimensions neck opening = 21 in 53 34 cm gauge 18 half_double_crochet stitches worked over 18 row measures an approximate 4-inch square using a size 3 75 mm crochet hook materials -1 skein of size 3 dk double knit yarn approximately 218 yds yarn pictured is bzypeach 100% pima cotton dk weight in purple apple berry colorway -crochet hook - size f/5 3 75 mm -stitch markers measuring tape scissors medium yarn needle pencil or dry erase marker + sheet protector for marking your progress on this pattern terminology and symbols chain = chain half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet increase = increase by working 2 half_double_crochet stitches in the same stitch
